title: Mindset & Attitude

questions.text: When facing obstacles, my mindset is usually...
choices: There's always a way through
This is a chance to learn something
I need to take it one step at a time
It's hard but I'll get through it

questions.text: What shapes my attitude most on a daily basis?
choices: How well I slept and my energy
What's happening at work or in life
My connections with people I love
Whether I'm working toward something meaningful

questions.text: When I'm feeling negative, what helps me shift?
choices: Talking it out with you
Physical activity or getting outside
Time alone to reset
Focusing on what I'm grateful for

questions.text: I believe that most things in life...
choices: Can be improved with effort
Happen for a reason
Are what you make of them
Balance out over time

questions.text: How do you positively influence my mindset?
choices: You help me see the bigger picture
You ground me when I'm spiraling
You believe in me when I don't
You bring lightness and humor

description: Explore how your attitudes and outlooks influence each other.
